mapper.insert:
insert into dows_uim.oauth_client_settings(client_id, jwk_set_url, signing_algorithm, require_proof_key, require_authorization_consent, deleted, dt) values
(#{entity.clientId}, #{entity.jwkSetUrl}, #{entity.signingAlgorithm}, #{entity.requireProofKey}, #{entity.requireAuthorizationConsent}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.dt})

insert into dows_uim.oauth_client_settings(client_id, jwk_set_url, signing_algorithm, require_proof_key, require_authorization_consent, deleted, dt) values
(#{entity.clientId}, #{entity.jwkSetUrl}, #{entity.signingAlgorithm}, #{entity.requireProofKey}, #{entity.requireAuthorizationConsent}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.dt})
on duplicate key update client_id = values(client_id) , jwk_set_url = values(jwk_set_url) , signing_algorithm = values(signing_algorithm) , require_proof_key = values(require_proof_key) , require_authorization_consent = values(require_authorization_consent) , deleted = values(deleted) , dt = values(dt)
